title: Sexy❤Aroma❤Night
description: Self-proclaimed "high-class seme" Kinezuka is a charismatic esthetician at a men's salon. One night, Kinezuka gets dead drunk and is taken home by a pheromone-laden hunk who plays a sexy trick on him. The next day, this man appears at the salon under his true guise: super-star actor Takanagi Kouya… Can Kinezuka protect his virtue from Takanagi, who's aiming for an erotic massage and Kinezuka's ass?
